description: **Tool Overview**: The Windows Cloud Files Mini Filter Driver assists in managing file operations in cloud environments, particularly focusing on handling elevation of privilege vulnerabilities. This filter driver enhances the security context in which files are accessed and manipulated, providing an additional layer of protection against unauthorized access. **Details**: This driver is applicable to systems running Windows 10 and Windows 11 and integrates with the cloud file service architecture. It is crucial for maintaining the integrity and confidentiality of cloud-stored files. Users should ensure that their systems are updated with patches KB-5034123, KB-5034122, and KB-5034121 to address identified vulnerabilities in this area. Regular updates to this driver will help mitigate potential security risks associated with local or remote exploitation of privilege elevation vulnerabilities.
